deduction_content: Knee/s bent at the apex of the kick
Heel of supporting leg off the floor

questions.question: What is the error code for Zhèng Ti Tuí (Front Stretch Kick)?
What are the two main deduction points for Zhèng Ti Tuí?
questions.answer: Deductions are applied when: 1) Knee/s are bent at the apex of the kick, and 2) Heel of supporting leg is off the floor.

questions.question: What is the correct leg position at the apex of Zhèng Ti Tuí?
questions.answer: The leg should be completely straight at the apex of the kick with no bend in the knee.

questions.question: What is the correct foot position for the supporting leg during Zhèng Ti Tuí?
questions.answer: The heel of the supporting leg must remain in contact with the floor throughout the technique.
